title: Ancient Voices
description: A Sound Track Featuring Powerful Vocals
longDescription:
Introducing Ancient Voices! A unique soundtrack to add to your collection. The human voice is the most powerful storytelling instrument of them all. We all remember where we were when we loaded up the halo loading screen music for the first time...


Hear the tracks: https://soundcloud.com/revivalgamefilmportfolio/sets/ancient-voices


Each track features a unique singer or choir that will bring powerful and raw emotion to your game. The soundtrack includes epic tribal shakedowns, powerful battle music, and highly emotional ballad's all with their own unique singer. These songs can be used to create the perfect loading screen, tribal village atmosphere, or serve as the perfect background music for dialogue and cutscenes. All songs have been mixed and mastered by our studio for the highest quality.


Like what you hear?

Available for custom Music/SFX

Revivalstudiobooking@gmail.com
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  A Complete and diverse soundtrack featuring powerful vocal performances from a variety of singers and choirs.
  •  16 Tracks ranging from tribal shakedowns to epic battle music. Every track features unique and stylized vocals to bring powerful emotion to your game.
  •  All Tracks are Mixed and Mastered

Number of Audio Wavs: 16

Number of Audio Cues: 16

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 HZ

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 20:00

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
